sentences.en: Objective : To obverse the effect of Qingqianfang on rats with abacterial prostatitis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察清前方对大鼠慢性非细菌性前列腺炎的影响.

sentences.en: Obverse stable fixation, rate of union and infection for distal of tibial fractures.
sentences.cn: 观察胫骨下段骨折的固定的稳定性 、 骨折愈合率和感染率.

sentences.en: On the obverse, a winged goddess holding laurel branches in both hands, arms raised.
sentences.cn: 奖牌正面为张着双翅的胜利女神双臂上举,双手托着月桂花冠.

sentences.en: On the obverse, an athlete standing on some steps, holding in his right hand a laurel crown, symbol of victory, and raising his left arm.
sentences.cn: 奖牌正面为一名运动员站在台阶上，右手拿着一簇月桂花冠，象征着胜利，左手高高举起。

sentences.en: On the obverse, the traditional goddess of victory, holding a palm in her left hand and a winner's crown in her right.
sentences.cn: 奖牌正面为传统的胜利女神。 她左手持棕榈叶，右手拿着胜利者佩戴的花冠。

sentences.en: Smooth language communication depends on obverse words expression.
sentences.cn: 语言信息交流的通畅依赖于话语的正向表达,其沟通的障碍多表现为话语的反向表达.

sentences.en: The head of the Queen appears on the obverse of British coins.
sentences.cn: 英国硬币的正面有女王的头像.

sentences.en: The obverse argumentation: Yes, a house affects modern love.
sentences.cn: 正方观点: 是, 房子影响现代爱情.

sentences.en: The obverse of love is hate.
The obverse of love is hate.
The obverse of rising unemployment is continued gains in productivity.
sentences.cn: 失业率上升，相对应的是生产率进一步提高。

sentences.en: The obverse shows the Huangguoshu Waterfall in Guizhou province.
sentences.cn: 正面以贵州省黄果树瀑布作主题.

sentences.en: The obverse shows the scenery of the Yellow Mountain.
sentences.cn: 正面以黄山风光作主题.

sentences.en: The obverse shows the Temple of Heaven in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 正面以北京天坛作主题.

sentences.en: The obverse thethe ancient coliseum and the goddess of victory holding a winner's crown.
sentences.cn: 奖牌正面是古代竞技场和手持月桂花冠的胜利女神奈基.

sentences.en: We must see the reverse as well as the obverse side of things.
sentences.cn: 我们既要看到事物的正面,也要看到事物的反面.

sentences.en: We should see the reverse as well as the obverse of things.
sentences.cn: 我们不但应该看到事物的正面,也要看到事物的反面.

sentences.en: While Star Wars characters are depicted in colour on the reverse of the new coins, a traditional effigy of the Queen by the sculptor Raphael Maklouf dominates the obverse.
sentences.cn: 星战角色的彩照将被印在钱币的背面， 正面依然是雕塑家拉斐尔•马克鲁夫笔下的传统女王肖像。

words.tran_cn: 正面的；[植]倒转的；对应面的
正面；对立面；主要的一面

trans.tran_cn: 对立面，前面或上面，钱币或奖章的正面，对应部分

trans.tran_en: the opposite of a particular situation or feeling
